comments:
I get the following error when trying to run any JUnit tests (JUnit 4.1). Tests had been working, but I started to get a ClassDefNotFound (or similar) exception in JUnit that did not show a stack trace. At first, it was for only one test, then all of them (all with the same classpath). Then I started to get this error when trying to Run or Debug these tests:

eclipse.buildId=M20060629-1905
java.version=1.5.0_06
java.vendor=Apple Computer, Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=macosx, ARCH=ppc, WS=carbon, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -keyring /Users/username/.eclipse_keyring -showlocation
Command-line arguments:  -os macosx -ws carbon -keyring /Users/username/.eclipse_keyring -consoleLog -showlocation

Error
Tue Jul 18 13:43:38 MDT 2006
An internal error occurred during: "Launching".

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.launcher.JUnit4TestFinder$Annotation.annotates(JUnit4TestFinder.java:84)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.launcher.JUnit4TestFinder.isTest(JUnit4TestFinder.java:163)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.launcher.SingleTypeTestSearchExtent.find(SingleTypeTestSearchExtent.java:31)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.launcher.TestKind.search(TestKind.java:107)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.launcher.TestKindRegistry.getTestTypes(TestKindRegistry.java:181)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.launcher.JUnitBaseLaunchConfiguration.findTestTypes(JUnitBaseLaunchConfiguration.java:126)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.launcher.JUnitBaseLaunchConfiguration.launch(JUnitBaseLaunchConfiguration.java:90)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:639)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:565)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:754)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$6.run(DebugUIPlugin.java:944)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
I fixed the NPE in HEAD (for I20060725-0800), but I think the underlying reason for the trouble were compile errors in the project. It looks like your classpath is not OK. Try Project > Clean... .
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
